name: Skelchess
description:
Tactical Chess game that each unit has different play

This is turn base game for 2 player

When all 8 units die, the game will ends and the side with the remaining more units wins

  1. Sword [ Atk 2 ] [  Hp 5 ]  [  Range 1 ]
  2. Shield [ Atk 1 ] [ Hp 10 ] [  Range 1 ]
  3. Archer [ Atk 2 ] [ Hp 4 ] [  Range 2 ]

This is student project

Thank you
